video.title: Gotham
video.synopsis: Long before he was commissioner, rookie cop James Gordon takes on Gotham City crime and corruption to avenge the murder of Bruce Wayne's parents.

episodes.synopsis: New detective James Gordon and his experienced partner, Harvey Bullock, investigate the murder of the billionaire parents of 12-year-old Bruce Wayne.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Gordon and Bullock investigate a child trafficking ring preying on street kids, including Selina; Penguin begins to make his way back to Gotham.
episodes.title: Selina Kyle

episodes.synopsis: Detectives Gordon and Bullock track down a vigilante who is killing corrupt Gotham citizens by attaching them to weather balloons.
episodes.title: The Balloonman

episodes.synopsis: As a contentious city council vote on the future of the Arkham District approaches, politicians on both sides are in danger.
episodes.title: Arkham

episodes.synopsis: Gordon and Bullock search for the source of a new drug that causes euphoria, then death; Cobblepot works his way deeper into Maroni's inner circle.
episodes.title: Viper

episodes.synopsis: When a killer begins targeting the firstborn of Gotham's elite, Bullock faces traumatic memories from a nearly identical case he worked in the past.
episodes.title: Spirit of the Goat

episodes.synopsis: Penguin reveals a new element of his manipulative strategy, forcing Gordon to deal with the consequences of his decision to spare Penguin's life.
episodes.title: Penguin's Umbrella

episodes.synopsis: When a Gothamite is found beaten to death, Gordon and Bullock are intrigued by the motive; Bruce returns to school and has trouble making friends.
episodes.title: The Mask

episodes.synopsis: Trying to close the Wayne murder case, young Harvey Dent encourages Gordon to team up with Mayor James; Penguin contacts Mooney's secret weapon, Liza.
episodes.title: Harvey Dent

episodes.synopsis: Selina leads a new friend on a perilous journey through Gotham to evade the assassins on her trail; Gordon is reassigned following a misstep.
episodes.title: Lovecraft

episodes.synopsis: Gordon's assignment at Arkham Asylum gets off to a rocky start when a guard's murder ignites an investigation, leading him to Dr. Leslie Thompkins.
episodes.title: Rogues' Gallery

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to get his job back, Gordon seeks to capture Jack Gruber, a deranged electrical genius who escapes Arkham Asylum.
episodes.title: What the Little Bird Told Him

episodes.synopsis: When the key witness in a homicide ends up dead while being held for questioning, Gordon suspects an inside job and seeks details from an old friend.
episodes.title: Welcome Back, Jim Gordon

episodes.synopsis: Fish reveals a secret of Oswald Cobblepot's, prompting a loyalty test from Maroni; Gordon and Bullock hunt a killer who targets victims with phobias.
episodes.title: The Fearsome Dr. Crane

episodes.synopsis: Gordon and Bullock aim to stop a biology teacher who has been harvesting the glands of his murder victims; Mooney continues plotting to gain power.
episodes.title: The Scarecrow

episodes.synopsis: Gordon takes Dr. Leslie Thompkins to the circus, but the circus comes under attack; Falcone enlists Butch Gilzean to help Penguin with the nightclub.
episodes.title: The Blind Fortune Teller

episodes.synopsis: Following several bank robberies, Gordon and Bullock investigate the Red Hood gang; Selina Kyle continues to bond with Barbara.
episodes.title: Red Hood

episodes.synopsis: While Gordon seeks information about the recent controversy with Commissioner Loeb, Fish's allegiance to the prisoners is questioned.
episodes.title: Everyone Has a Cobblepot

episodes.synopsis: Gordon and Bullock investigate a cold case involving a serial killer who targets young women in Gotham City; Fish plots her escape from the Dollmaker.
episodes.title: Beasts of Prey

episodes.synopsis: Gordon and Bullock continue to investigate the Ogre, who makes a move on someone close to Gordon; Bruce and Selina expose a corrupt Wayne Enterprises.
episodes.title: Under the Knife

episodes.synopsis: The Ogre breaks down Barbara's emotions as Gordon and Bullock go to great lengths to track him down; Penguin leads a massacre, beginning an epic war.
episodes.title: The Anvil or the Hammer

episodes.synopsis: As Gotham City's gang war reaches a boiling point, Fish Mooney goes head-to-head with Maroni and Penguin in a bid to reclaim the city.
episodes.title: All Happy Families Are Alike

episodes.synopsis: As Bruce learns more about his late father's secrets, Gordon forms a reluctant partnership with Oswald Cobblepot.
episodes.title: Damned If You Do

episodes.synopsis: Gordon leads the charge to find the Arkham escapees who are still at large. Meanwhile, Alfred takes drastic measures to protect Bruce.
episodes.title: Knock, Knock

episodes.synopsis: Alfred convinces Bruce to attend a children's hospital benefit that turns unexpectedly sinister by evening's end.
episodes.title: The Last Laugh

episodes.synopsis: A department tragedy leads to Gordon's promotion and a renewed commitment to fighting evil. Theo Galavan lays out his plan for Gotham's future.
episodes.title: Strike Force

episodes.synopsis: Gotham crime heats up when the Penguin and Galavan partner with a family of arsonists. An old feud resurfaces between the Galavans and the Waynes.
episodes.title: Scarification

episodes.synopsis: As a conflicted Bridgit weighs her options, Penguin and Galavan continue their dueling quests for power.
episodes.title: By Fire

episodes.synopsis: A vengeful Penguin is determined to free his mother from captivity. Upon meeting for the first time, Silver and Selina clash over Bruce.
episodes.title: Mommy's Little Monster

episodes.synopsis: After Barbara wakes up from a chilling nightmare, a power-hungry Galavan makes Bruce an offer that's hard to refuse.
episodes.title: Tonight's the Night

episodes.synopsis: Lee expresses concern over Gordon's dark side. Edward nurses an injured Penguin back to health -- and seeks his advice.
episodes.title: A Bitter Pill to Swallow

episodes.synopsis: Selina and Bruce renew their partnership. Meanwhile, Gordon renews his quest to keep Galavan behind bars where he belongs.
episodes.title: The Son of Gotham

episodes.synopsis: After Bruce is abducted, Gordon turns to an unlikely ally to stop Galavan's plans for revenge against the Waynes.
episodes.title: Worse Than a Crime

episodes.synopsis: Gordon prepares for an important testimony. Meanwhile, theres a chilling new villain in Gotham, and hes freezing people to death.
episodes.title: Mr. Freeze

episodes.synopsis: Alfred shares new information about the man who killed Bruce's parents. The police prepare to move a new inmate to Arkham Asylum.
episodes.title: A Dead Man Feels No Cold

episodes.synopsis: Penguin continues his work with Hugo Strange, whos confident he can cure his aggression. Bruce renews his vow to find his parents killer.
episodes.title: This Ball of Mud and Meanness

episodes.synopsis: While Gordon and Bullock investigate a museum robbery, Penguin catches up with some old friends. Bruce tests his new street smarts.
episodes.title: Mad Grey Dawn

episodes.synopsis: Gordon gets a taste of prison life, and Bullock delivers devastating news. Elsewhere, Penguin deals with family dysfunction.
episodes.title: Prisoners

episodes.synopsis: While a desperate Gordon works to clear his name, Penguin learns the surprising truth about his father's death.
episodes.title: Into the Woods

episodes.synopsis: Barbara reaches out to Gordon in an attempt to repair their relationship. Bruce and Alfred launch a search for one of Thomas Wayne's old associates.
episodes.title: Pinewood

episodes.synopsis: While Gordon questions Professor Strange about his work at Pinewood Farms, a dangerous new villain prepares to take aim at the city.
episodes.title: Azrael

episodes.synopsis: Azrael's vow to kill Gordon prompts the Penguin to come out of the woodwork. But it doesn't take long for Bruce to become the new target.
episodes.title: Unleashed

episodes.synopsis: With support from Gordon, Lucius and Alfred, Bruce sets out to save Selina. But first, they'll have to find Professor Strange's secret lab.
episodes.title: A Legion of Horribles

episodes.synopsis: Gordon undergoes a drug-fueled transformation deep inside Professor Strange's lab. Meanwhile, a new threat looms for Gotham.
episodes.title: Transference

episodes.synopsis: Gordon takes to the streets of Gotham as a bounty hunter to find mad-scientist supervillain Hugo Strange and his reanimated subject, Fish Mooney.
episodes.title: Better to Reign in Hell

episodes.synopsis: Professor Strange is still at large, but Fish is determined to find him. Meanwhile, Gordon and journalist Valerie Vale are determined to find Fish.
episodes.title: Burn the Witch

episodes.synopsis: Gordon signs on to help new Gotham arrival Jervis Tetch, aka the Mad Hatter, find his lost sister, Alice. Elsewhere, Penguin preps for a mayoral run.
episodes.title: Look Into My Eyes

episodes.synopsis: With Penguin poised to become mayor of Gotham, Bruce and Alfred comb the city for Bruce's doppelgnger, who's completely assumed Bruce's identity.
episodes.title: New Day Rising

episodes.synopsis: While Bruce looks for Ivy, a newly elected Mayor Cobblepot faces a stack of campaign promises -- and unprecedented crime levels.
episodes.title: Anything for You

episodes.synopsis: A sadistic Mad Hatter forces Gordon to make an agonizing choice. Puzzle-loving Edward "Ed" Nygma reconnects with a face from his past.
episodes.title: Follow the White Rabbit

episodes.synopsis: A run-in with the Mad Hatter sends Gordon down a psychedelic rabbit hole. Penguin struggles to accept the nature of Nygma's new relationship.
episodes.title: The Red Queen

episodes.synopsis: As a deeply affected Barnes descends into madness, Nygma navigates his relationship with Isabella. Falcone throws Lee and Mario an engagement party.
episodes.title: Blood Rush

episodes.synopsis: Gordon urges Bullock to investigate Barnes, and Nygma turns to Penguin when he gets devastating news. Ivy opens up to Bruce and Selina.
episodes.title: The Executioner

episodes.synopsis: As a new threat bubbles to the surface before Lee and Mario's rehearsal dinner, Bruce begins to unravel the secrets surrounding the Court of Owls.
episodes.title: Time Bomb

episodes.synopsis: As the virus starts spreading through the city, the Gotham lab developing a cure is compromised. Gordon and Mario face off before the wedding.
episodes.title: Beware the Green-Eyed Monster

episodes.synopsis: Gordon and Bullock unearth shadowy plans to resurrect an old foe. Selina's mother returns to Gotham, and Penguin prepares for prime time.
episodes.title: Ghosts

episodes.synopsis: Dwight's decision to bring Jerome back from the dead incites frenzy among his followers. Penguin and Nygma's power struggle intensifies.
episodes.title: Smile Like You Mean It

episodes.synopsis: Jerome sets his sights on Bruce. Elsewhere, Gordon's uncle pays him a visit, and Penguin and Nygma face their issues head on.
episodes.title: The Gentle Art of Making Enemies

episodes.synopsis: Gotham gets a questionable new villain when Nygma rolls out "The Riddler." Disturbing details emerge about the death of Gordon's late father.
episodes.title: How the Riddler Got His Name

episodes.synopsis: As a terrible weapon threatens the city, Bruce begins his lessons with the Shaman. Meanwhile, Gordon unearths surprising ties in his family tree.
episodes.title: These Delicate and Dark Obsessions

episodes.synopsis: There's a chill in the air when some of Gotham's most notorious villains -- including Mr. Freeze -- come together to talk in terrifying numbers.
episodes.title: The Primal Riddle

episodes.synopsis: As terrible truths come to light, Gordon presses Kathryn for a seat at the Court of Owls' table. Elsewhere, Bruce intensifies his training.
episodes.title: Light the Wick

episodes.synopsis: As the Shaman shows his hand, a dazzling discovery unlocks the secrets of Gotham's underworld. Penguin and Riddler are forced to work together.
episodes.title: All Will Be Judged

episodes.synopsis: With a deadly virus looming over Gotham, some of the city's most maniacal villains join forces, and a young Bruce is poised to accept his destiny.
episodes.title: Pretty Hate Machine

episodes.synopsis: The search for an antidote intensifies as darkness spreads over Gotham -- and a trio of villains make plans. Bruce struggles to let go of his past.
episodes.title: Destiny Calling / Heavydirtysoul

episodes.synopsis: While Bruce adapts to life as a vigilante, Penguin plans a grand opening for his new "Iceberg Lounge." A new villain forces Gotham to face its fears.
episodes.title: Pax Penguina

episodes.synopsis: As the Scarecrow gathers an army, Penguin issues a public challenge for Gordon to find Jonathan Crane. Selina and Tabitha negotiate a new partnership.
episodes.title: The Fear Reaper

episodes.synopsis: Gordon goes to Falcone for help, and Bruce dons a series of disguises. A theft at the Iceberg Lounge hits Penguin where it hurts.
episodes.title: They Who Hide Behind Masks

episodes.synopsis: Bruce and Alfred court danger while digging into the knife's ancient origins. Meanwhile, Nygma wants revenge -- but he seems to have lost his touch.
episodes.title: The Demon's Head

episodes.synopsis: Bruce takes matters into his own hands, and Nygma comes face to face with an old associate. Sofia appeals to Penguin's soft side.
episodes.title: The Blade's Path

episodes.synopsis: A new killer hits Gotham with a disturbing M.O.: killing cops and crowning his victims with a severed pigs head. Grundy takes to the ring.
episodes.title: Hog Day Afternoon

episodes.synopsis: A disturbing delivery at the precinct prompts Penguin to offer his services. An old friend talks Bruce into meeting up with some former classmates.
episodes.title: A Day in the Narrows

episodes.synopsis: A vengeful Penguin sends the Sirens after Nygma when he hears he's being publicly mocked. A big promotion comes between Gordon and Bullock.
episodes.title: Stop Hitting Yourself

episodes.synopsis: While Sofia plans a posh fundraiser for the orphanage, Professor Pyg gives Gotham a taste of whats to come. Bruce and Alfred go into the woods.
episodes.title: Let Them Eat Pie

episodes.synopsis: Gordon digs into Pyg's past in an attempt to unmask him while Lee tightens her control over the Narrows. A scorned Penguin lashes out at Sofia.
episodes.title: Things That Go Boom

episodes.synopsis: Penguin's plan to call an old rival back to Gotham erupts in unexpected violence. Bruce and Alfred come to blows over bad behavior.
episodes.title: Queen Takes Knight

episodes.synopsis: A colorful new persona takes root in Gotham, and Alfred adjusts to life away from Wayne Manor. Nygma backs Lee in her quest to rebuild the Narrows.
episodes.title: Pieces of a Broken Mirror

episodes.synopsis: Ivy leaves behind an intoxicating calling card while digging up dirt on a top-secret project. Jerome pokes fun at Penguin, and Bruce sees his future.
episodes.title: A Beautiful Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Sofia makes steep demands on the Narrows, and a remorseful Bruce reaches out to Alfred. A widespread attack on Gotham reeks of vengeance.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: While Gordon and Bullock look for a key witness to take Sofia down, Lee goes to Penguin and Nygma with a plan for revenge. Selina asks Bruce for help.
episodes.title: The Sinking Ship, The Grand Applause

episodes.synopsis: A coordinated breakout at Arkham begets bedlam -- and blood -- in the streets. Bruce pursues an old enemy. Painful memories reveal Barbara's purpose.
episodes.title: One of My Three Soups

episodes.synopsis: Jerome calls the first meeting of the "Legion of Horribles," and Nygma hosts a game show in the Narrows. Penguin goes to Butch with a proposal.
episodes.title: Mandatory Brunch Meeting

episodes.synopsis: Gordon goes to Bruce with a plan when Jerome makes demands on Gotham. Penguin has second thoughts, and Barbara unlocks her destiny.
episodes.title: That's Entertainment

episodes.synopsis: A rash of bank robberies keeps Gordon and Bullock busy. A familiar evil reawakens, putting Barbara in danger -- and forcing Selina to choose sides.
episodes.title: To Our Deaths and Beyond

episodes.synopsis: Chaos reigns as Jerome's followers swarm the GCPD and Nygma moves to bust Lee out of custody. Bruce builds trust with Jeremiah.
episodes.title: That Old Corpse

episodes.synopsis: Bullock steps in to defuse an explosive plot with help from the city's unlikeliest heroes. Bruce answers a fateful call that stirs his darkest fears.
episodes.title: One Bad Day

episodes.synopsis: Ra's al Ghul's dark vision is realized as the governor declares martial law and Jeremiah lures Bruce into a trap. But Barbara's ready for a fight.
episodes.title: No Man's Land

episodes.synopsis: Old villains stake their claim in a chaotic Gotham, where Gordon and Bruce fight to keep the city safe, and Selina confronts an uncertain future.
episodes.title: Year Zero

episodes.synopsis: While Bruce looks for a so-called witch, Gordon and Bullock follow a lead to a factory filled with missing kids. Elsewhere, Nygma deals with demons.
episodes.title: Trespassers

episodes.synopsis: There's a safe place for Gotham's refugees -- until Penguin comes to collect his people. A determined Selina recruits Bruce to help her find Jeremiah.
episodes.title: Penguin,	Our	Hero

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of an explosive attack, Penguin offers Gordon his assistance, and Lucius and Nygma strike a deal. Meanwhile, Selina narrows her search.
episodes.title: Ruin

episodes.synopsis: A military task force arrives in Gotham to help restore order. Nygma's search for answers leads him to Penguin -- and a reunion with Hugo Strange.
episodes.title: Pena Dura

episodes.synopsis: It's a war of unlikely alliances as Gordon gathers a team to take Gotham back. A cunning new villain keeps Penguin and Selina on their toes.
episodes.title: 13 Stitches

episodes.synopsis: Gordon races to expose the criminal element that's threatening Gotham's reunification. A familiar villain returns with help from the Mad Hatter.
episodes.title: Ace	Chemicals

episodes.synopsis: A shape-shifting villain targeting Gotham's police officers connects Bullock to ghosts from his past. Bruce and Alfred explore the city's sewers.
episodes.title: Nothing's Shocking

episodes.synopsis: A stricken Gordon falls deep into a fever dream, standing trial for a series of failures. Back in the present, Ivy returns and sets her sights on Bruce.
episodes.title: The	Trial of Jim Gordon

episodes.synopsis: Bruce and Gordon come face-to-face with Eduardo, who's undergone a major transformation. An expectant Barbara turns to Lee for help.
episodes.title: I Am Bane

episodes.synopsis: As Bane and Nyssa tighten their grip on the city, Gordon turns to his former enemies to help save it. A big decision points Bruce toward his destiny.
episodes.title: They Did What?

episodes.synopsis: A decade after leaving Gotham, Bruce returns for the opening of the new Wayne Tower to find a dark city in need of a knight.
episodes.title: The	Beginning...
